bade amaruwata honda karanna kiyala ee dosthara mahaththuru mage unduka puchchaya kapa damawi kiyala hithe upanna prithiya nisa mama badata kottayak thiyala thada karagena wedanawa winda daragaththa ..

kiyanne, mokakda meken wenne kiyala.

bande siyalage aachchiyi gallaththe aachchiyi ape aachchiyi bara kathabahaka.
hari ehema aaranchiyak thiyenam kiyapan hariya..

mama kalin kiwa api 1993 wasare puhunu wim aarambha kala kiyala, api dennama ekata res walata yomu wunath kapila thama mulinma res padde. 1993 wasaredi pannala trak eke thibunu tharagayata kapila idiripath una, me tharagaya atharathuradi kapila aksidant una, atha kaduna, muhunata thuwala una haku ataya biduna, me nisa kapilata awurudu eka hamarakata wada res walata yanna une naha.

madhyawedi panaya : amathiwaru nodanwa wunata me wanawita meka ketumpath karamin thiyewana.meka ketumpath karanna prawruththi adhyaksha ranga kalansuriya mahaththaya dannawa denmarkaye thiyena intarnashanal midiya saport kiyana aayathanaye sahaya thamayi sampurnayen aran thiyenne.ayi eewage aayathanayaka sahaya rajaye prawruththi adhyaksha aacharya ranga kalansuriya : meka aarambha kale giya juni mase ape mathiwarana poronduwak thiyenawa puwathpath mandala panatha wenuwata wada swadina niyamana kramawedayak hadunwala denawa kiyala.giya juni mase agamathithuma apita upades dunna ee katayuthu aarambha karanna kiyala.
emenma thawaduratath rajya rahas heli karana bawada juliyan asanj awadharanaya kara siti.
uthure janathawa saginnen marimata salasum sahagatha wadapiliwelak thibu bawada memagin kiya pannaki.

kathawa desata haremu ,kathawa patan ganne mangala mandapayata paminena karthi thamage aadarawanthiya paharaganna darshanayakin.thamage podi kalayedi karthi dakinawa pradeshaye chanda apekshakayekuge puthaku wisin thama sahodariya aadaraya kala waradata ayage aadarawanthaya samaga marala danawa.pasuwa ema deshapalakayage puthage wiwaha mandapayedi ohuwa polisiya wisin athadanguwata ganu labanawa.ee karthige thaththa wisini.pasuwa karthige thaththa ema pradeshayen maru wi wenath pradeshayakata yanawa.kalakata pasuwa karthi wadiwiyata path wi ohuta adhyapanaya sadaha amarikawata yamata wisa labenawa.ee atharathura amma ,thaththa nawatha gamata yamata thiranaya karanawa.ehidi karthita thamange yahaluwan saha ohuge podi wayase aadare karapu anuwa muna gahenawa.pasuwa mowun munagasi aadaraya sundarawa galagena yanawa.eeth owunge aadaraya anushage gedarin danagena ayawa waidya widyalayakata athulak karanawa.namuth owunge aadaraya duras wanne naha ,fon eken witena hamu wi aadaraya digatama gala yanawa.dineka nawa wasara patan gath dineka ra karthi anushata katha kalath aya fon ekata uththara denne naha.aya pasuwada udema ayawa balanna yanawa ,ewita aya pawasanawa gedarin danagena athi nisa ayage fon ekata katha nokara yaluwage fon ekata ganna yayi pawasanawa.ethan patan kalayak yanathuru ohu ayata karadara nokara adhyapanayata ida di kalaya gatha karanawa.mese kalaya geweddi hadisiyema anusha gedara awith sitina bawa yahaluwekugen danagannawa.karthi eda rama horen ayage gedarata gos aya samaga katha kota pasuda kowilata paminena lesa danwanawa.owun pasuda kowiledi aya samaga wiwaha wimata uthsaha ganna awasthawedi anushage thaththa pamina ayata paharadi aapahu ragena yanawa.kese ho owun dedenage aadaraya depasata wi karthi pissek bawata path wenawa.ohu mathdrawya walata abbahi wanawa.me siddi nisa karthige amma marumuwata pathwenawa.karthi barapathala thaththwayen rohal gathakaranawa.
